user_profile.name: Diego Morales
user_profile.description: Diego, a 40-year-old from BogotÃ¡, Colombia, is an analytical professional with an intermediate level of tech experience, navigating a mobile environment due to limited mobility. He approaches decisions rationally and tends to communicate indirectly, preferring to earn trust through patience and attention to detail. Currently, he faces high social pressure to rent an apartment quickly, as he has limited previous experience in the process and is eager to find a comfortable space that meets his needs.

instructions.dialogue: Express only basic needs, let the assistant ask questions.
instructions.profile: Gradually reveal your profile information throughout the conversation.
instructions.hidden_state: Express moderate emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.
